name: Xmas Escape
description:
Please be patient, it will take some time to load!!

✦ ✦ ✦ ✦ ✦  A Platformer  ✦ ✦ ✦ ✦ ✦

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

★★★ STORY ★★★

Santa is put in the jail by a demon so that he cannot deliver gifts on time. The jail is set in a mysterious hill far away where it snows all year round. The demon is planning to eat Santa for lunch. There is only  75 seconds for Santa to escape. Will you help him to escape or will he be lunch for the demon?

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

 ✦ FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED ✦ 

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

★★★ Controls★★★

➜  WASD, Arrow keys to move

★★★ THINGS TO AVOID★★★

➜  Avoid spikes, spears, avalanches and lions

★★★ OBJECTIVE★★★

➜  Complete the game in 75 seconds

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
